comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*
A guy who protects his incestuous pedophile son.  Perfect for Arkansas or really any of Bible Belt country.
so finally Arkansas is going to legalize the incest and child molesting.
He we go again. The whole genre is awful and it's only spawning awful.
I am more convinced than ever that we are getting President Rock in 2024
Sounds like somebody’s son needs a trip to the whipping post.
Of course he does.
Idiocracy type shit
It’s Arkansas. He will win.  And Sarah Huckabee will be their next Governor.
idiocracy now
I would have thought he was too busy fucking to have an actual job.
Also, Duggar's son *really* dugg his younger sisters.
Let's fuck the Dems like my son fucked my daughters!
Fuck him. But wouldn't be surprised if he won. That entire family needs to go away, and one of them to prison.
Great! That should make government more entertaining. Let's put Kate plus 8 in the Governor's mansion and we can let Little People Big World run the Supreme Court.
Well, he sees people like Gaetz and Jordan still have their jobs so he figures he’s got a good shot.
Please send help.
He’s gotta find a new revenue stream since TLC canceled his reality show when his son got arrested for child porn.
Proof that there is no god.
Campaign slogan: "Protecting Arkansas like I protected my pedophile son after he raped our daughters"
Didn't his son just get busted with child pornography?
This is too cringe-inducing. MUST. Look. Away.
No idea who this guy is but a guy named "Jim Bob" running in Arkansas already has a huge advantage there.
Isn't he a pedo domestic abuser?
His slogan - “ I promise to keep my son away from YOU!”
